title: LegacyOfKain  Soul Reaver 2 PC-CompactedPortable
description:
Hi to all PC games fans and in particularly to the Legacy of Kain addicts ...


This file have the Legacy of Kain Soul Reaver 2 game in a single executable
that can be used by compacted portability method, or be extracted out completly ...

more information below ...


run CompactedPortableStarter and in 30 seconds
the game will start 

after playing and quitting game the saves will be at MyDocuments
folder in a Soul Reaver 2 folder and the executable
is deleted

CAUTION : sometimes the player can get ununexpected crashes, it is
          not happen all the time and probably only in some specifics
          points of the game, can happen or not depending on the player
          movement and because of that i included the First savegame point
          that can be unzipped and moved to the game savedgames folder mentionated 



GETTING THE COMPACTED PORTABLE EXECUTABLE OUT OPTION

to get the portable executable to quick launch just run
the executable with the same name and wait about 30 seconds and
a compacted portable executable with 792 Mb will be available on the folder and
after that move the extracted executable to somewhere else on the computer
to let the compressed compacted portable do is work ...

Happy game ...


LOK SoulReaver2 PC-CompactedPortable GlobeplusRippingWork GamingIsForEveryone




* enjoy
